    public class MapillaryMainDialog
extends org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.dialogs.ToggleDialog
implements org.openstreetmap.josm.data.cache.ICachedLoaderListener, MapillaryDataListener
    Toggle dialog that shows an image and some buttons.
